languages.text: "Мое стремление вновь оказаться в приближенных к тебе кругах удивляет, Домин'{name}? Почему? Разве не приятно тебе мое желание влиться в твою среду, принять ее, отдаться ей? Я была несколько... рассеянна во время первого визита в свет. Теперь все иначе".

traits.locale_text: "Мое стремление вновь оказаться в приближенных к тебе кругах удивляет, Домин'{name}? Почему? Разве не приятно тебе мое желание влиться в твою среду, принять ее, отдаться ей? Я была несколько... рассеянна во время первого визита в свет. Теперь все иначе".

languages.text: "My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Domin'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."
languages.original_text: "Мое стремление вновь оказаться в приближенных к тебе кругах удивляет, Домин'{name}? Почему? Разве не приятно тебе мое желание влиться в твою среду, принять ее, отдаться ей? Я была несколько... рассеянна во время первого визита в свет. Теперь все иначе".

traits.locale_text: "My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Enim'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your element, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. That won't be the case this time."

"My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Enim'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your element, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. That won't be the case this time."

"My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Enim'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."

"My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Enim'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."

"My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Domin'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."

"My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Domin'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."

languages.text: "Mein Wunsch, mich unter Euresgleichen zu mischen, überrascht Euch, Domin'{name}? Inwiefern? Erfreut es Euch denn nicht, dass ich Teil Eurer Welt sein möchte, sie akzeptieren, mich ihr ergeben? Bei meiner ersten Exkursion in die Oberschicht war ich recht ... unbeholfen. Doch das wird nicht wieder geschehen."
languages.original_text: "My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Domin'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Wunsch, mich unter Euresgleichen zu mischen, überrascht Euch, Domin'{name}? Inwiefern? Erfreut es Euch denn nicht, dass ich Teil Eurer Welt sein möchte, sie akzeptieren, mich ihr ergeben? Bei meiner ersten Exkursion in die Oberschicht war ich recht ... unbeholfen. Doch das wird nicht wieder geschehen."

languages.text: «¿Le sorprende mi deseo de presentarme ante sus allegados, Domin'{name}? ¿Por qué? ¿No le complace que quiera formar parte de su mundo, aceptarlo, rendirme ante él? Mi primera excursión a la clase alta fue considerablemente... tosca. Pero no volverá a ocurrir».
languages.original_text: "My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Domin'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: «¿Le sorprende mi deseo de presentarme ante sus allegados, Domin'{name}? ¿Por qué? ¿No le complace que quiera formar parte de su mundo, aceptarlo, rendirme ante él? Mi primera excursión a la clase alta fue considerablemente... tosca. Pero no volverá a ocurrir».

languages.text: 「あなたの社交の輪の一員になりたいという願望に驚いているの、ドミン・{name}？どうして？私があなたの世界の一部になりたいと願うことを、それを受け入れ、身を委ねることを喜んではくれないの？私、どちらかというと…無礼だったでしょ。上流階級に初めて足を踏み入れた時。デモ、もう二度とそんなことにはならないわ」
languages.original_text: "My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Domin'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの社交の輪の一員になりたいという願望に驚いているの、エニム・{name}？どうして？私があなたの世界の一部になりたいと願うことを、それを受け入れ、身を委ねることを喜んではくれないの？私、どちらかというと…無礼だったでしょ。上流階級に初めて足を踏み入れた時。デモ、もう二度とそんなことにはならないわ」

languages.text: “我渴望出现在你的圈子里，出现在所有人面前。莫非这让你吃了一惊吗，秘者{name}？为什么要吃惊呢？我想成为你的世界的一部分，拥抱它，臣服于它，你不开心吗？我在上流社会的首次露面很……缺乏风度，但这种事情再也不会发生了。”
languages.original_text: "My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Domin'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: “我渴望出现在你的圈子里，出现在所有人面前。莫非这让你吃了一惊吗，秘者{name}？为什么要吃惊呢？我想成为你的世界的一部分，拥抱它，臣服于它，你不开心吗？我在上流社会的首次露面很……缺乏风度，但这种事情再也不会发生了。”

languages.text: « Pourquoi vous étonnez-vous que je cherche à me tenir à vos côtés au même titre que vos proches, Domin'{name} ? N'êtes-vous pas {mf|heureux|heureuse} que je cherche à faire partie de votre monde ? J'admets avoir... manqué de grâce lors de ma première apparition dans la haute société, mais je peux vous promettre que cela ne se reproduira plus. »
languages.original_text: "My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Domin'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi vous étonnez-vous que je cherche à me tenir à vos côtés au même titre que vos proches, Domin'{name} ? N'êtes-vous pas {mf|heureux|heureuse} que je cherche à faire partie de votre monde ? J'admets avoir... manqué de grâce lors de ma première apparition dans la haute société, mais je peux vous promettre que cela ne se reproduira plus. »

languages.text: "Yakın çevrendeki insanların arasında yer alma arzum seni şaşırtıyor mu Domin'{name}? Nasıl? Dünyanın parçası olup onu benimsemem, hatta ona teslim olmak istemem seni memnun etmiyor mu? Üst sınıfın arasına ilk karıştığımda bir nebze... Nahoş davrandım. Ancak bu bir daha yaşanmayacak."
languages.original_text: "My desire to appear among the people in your circle surprises you, Domin'{name}? How so? Does it not please you that I wish to be part of your world, embrace it, surrender to it? I was rather... graceless on my first excursion out into the upper class. But that will not happen again."
